Signature.definition: the act of signing one's name or of making a mark in lieu thereof b

1 a.definition: the act of signing one's name or of making a mark in lieu thereof

sub_terms.b: the name of a person written with his or her own hand to signify that the writing which precedes accords with his or her wishes or intentions
sub_terms.c: any mark (as initials, stamp, or printed name) made on a document and intended to serve as an indication of the party's execution or authentication of the document and intent to be bound by it see also

2.definition: a distinguishing or identifying mark, feature, or qualitya distinctive method of committing a crime that is characteristic of an offender
